loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account.
registerDescription: Create a new account to get started.
noRidesFound: No available rides match your search. Please try different locations.
confirmBookingFor: You are booking a ride from
yourRideIsBooked: Your ride has been successfully booked. The driver will contact you shortly.
fillTheForm: Fill the form below to submit your driver application.
fillTheFormToPublish: Fill the form below to publish a new ride.
weWillReviewYourApplication: We will review your application and get back to you soon.
noPendingApplications: No pending applications at the moment.
youMustBeVerified: You must be a verified driver to publish rides.
yourRideIsNowLive: Your ride is now live and visible to clients.
onlyAdminsCanAccess: Only administrators can access this page.
loginPrompt: Please log in to view this page.
validationErrorDescBooking: Please fill in all required fields.
errorEmailInUse: This email is already in use.
errorWeakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters.
applicationUnsubmittedDesc: Please complete your application to become a driver.
myOrdersDesc: Here you can track the status of your ride bookings.
noOrdersYet: You have not booked any rides yet.
loginToSeeOrders: Please log in to see your orders.
noBookingsYet: No bookings for your rides yet.
adminLoginDescription: Enter your admin credentials to access the dashboard.
unauthorizedAccess: You do not have permission to access this.
loginToBook: To book a ride, please log in or create a passenger account.
driversCannotBook: Drivers and Admins cannot book rides.
bookingRequestSent_desc: The driver has been notified. You can track the status in 'My Orders'.
carPhotoDropzone: Drag & drop or click to upload car photo
statusPage_pending_desc: Your application is currently under review. We will notify you once it's processed. Thank you for your patience.
statusPage_rejected_desc: We're sorry, but your application could not be approved at this time. Please contact support for more information.
statusPage_checking_desc: Please wait while we check your application status.
validationErrorDescStep1: Please enter a valid first name, last name, and passport number.
validationErrorDescStep2: Please fill all car details and upload a photo.
validationErrorDescStep3: Please enter a valid vehicle registration certificate number.
notifications_desc: Here you can find your recent notifications.
notification_ride_approved_desc: Your ride from Navoiy to Buxoro has been approved and is now visible to passengers.
notification_new_booking_desc: You have a new booking request for your ride from Navoiy to Buxoro.
notification_app_approved_desc: Congratulations! Your driver application has been approved.
notification_booking_accepted_desc: Your booking for the ride from Sirdaryo to Toshkent has been accepted by the driver.
notification_booking_rejected_desc: Unfortunately, your booking for the ride from Sirdaryo to Toshkent was rejected by the driver.
diagnostics_desc: Fill the form to complete your profile.
diagnostics_complete_desc: Your profile is verified. You can now publish and manage rides.
rating_desc: This is your average rating from passengers. A higher rating helps you get more bookings.
diagnostics_profile_button_desc: Submit or check your verification status
activeRideDesc: You can only have one active ride at a time. Please wait for it to be completed or contact support.
